title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\SetNodePoolManagementRequest
name: SetNodePoolManagementRequest
description:
SetNodePoolManagementRequest sets the node management properties of a node pool.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.SetNodePoolManagementRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Deprecated. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster to update. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.node_pool_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the node pool to update. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.management
params.description: Required. NodeManagement configuration for the node pool.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster, node pool id) of the node pool to set management properties. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*/nodePools/*.
